headline: AM Best Assigns Credit Ratings to Safe Auto Choice Insurance Company, Safe Auto Value Insurance Company and Safe Auto Insurance Company
summary: OLDWICK, N.J., October 02, 2025--AM Best has assigned a Financial Strength Rating of A+ (Superior) and a Long-Term Issuer Credit Rating of "aa-" (Superior) to Safe Auto Choice Insurance Company (SACI), Safe Auto Value Insurance Company (SAVI) and Safe Auto Insurance Company (SAIC). The outlook assigned to these Credit Ratings (ratings) is stable. SACI, SAVI, and SAIC are all domiciled in Northbrook, IL and are ultimately owned by Allstate Insurance Group (Allstate).

headline: What Allstate (ALL)'s Leadership Shakeup and Improved Catastrophe Results Mean For Shareholders
summary: The Allstate Corporation announced significant changes to its senior leadership team, effective October 1, 2025, with Mario Rizzo appointed as Chief Operating Officer overseeing Property-Liability and Protection Services and Jess Merten transitioning from Chief Financial Officer to President of Property-Liability. This leadership reshuffling comes as the company reported lower-than-expected catastrophe losses and experienced growth in auto policies, strengthening optimism about its...

headline: Corebridge Financial (CRBG): Exploring Valuation After Nationwide Allstate Distribution Deal Expands Life Insurance Reach
summary: Corebridge Financial (CRBG) just made its life insurance products available to customers across the U.S. through a new nationwide distribution agreement with Allstate Financial Services. This move is expected to boost Corebridge’s reach in the competitive insurance landscape. See our latest analysis for Corebridge Financial. After a strong quarter with revenue and earnings ahead of forecasts, Corebridge Financial’s latest deal with Allstate has kept the spotlight on the company. While the new...

headline: Piper Sandler Maintains Overweight on Allstate (ALL) After Lower-Than-Expected Catastrophe Losses
summary: The Allstate Corporation (NYSE:ALL) ranks among the stocks with low beta that can beat market volatility. In light of The Allstate Corporation (NYSE:ALL)’s August catastrophe loss report, Piper Sandler reaffirmed its Overweight rating and $225 price target on the insurance company on September 19. According to the firm, Allstate’s August catastrophe losses came in less […]

headline: Keefe, Bruyette & Woods (KBW) Reiterates $246 PT and Outperform Rating on The Allstate Corporation (ALL)
summary: With significant upside potential, The Allstate Corporation (NYSE:ALL) secures a spot on our list of the 20 NYSE Stocks with the Lowest P/E Ratios. Keefe, Bruyette & Woods (KBW) reiterated The Allstate Corporation’s (NYSE:ALL) $246 price target and Outperform rating on September 19, 2025, as the insurer expanded its core auto business and continued recovering […]
